recap_documents.description: ORDER granting in part and denying in part 20 Motion for Summary Judgment. Silver City does not have counsel, and it cannot proceed pro se. [Doc. 18]. There will be no trial in this case. Therefore, if McKevitz wants to proceed, McKevitz is ORDERED to request that the Clerk enter a default on or before February 5, 2021 pursuant to Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 55. McKevits is ON NOTICE that failure to do so may result in this claim being dismissed under Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 41(b) for failure to prosecute. Signed by District Judge Charles E Atchley, Jr on 1/15/2021. (AML) Mailed to Terri L. Monteith - Registered Agent (Entered: 01/15/2021)

caseName: Warner Bros. Home Entertainment Inc v. Jonathan Fleming

recap_documents.description: CONSENT DECREE AND PERMANENT INJUNCTION by Judge Consuelo B. Marshall: Upon Joint Stipulation  19 , the Court hereby ORDERS that Defendant Jonathan Fleming, an individual and d/b/a Amazon.com Seller Pre-OwnedBooks, and his agents, servants, employees , representatives, successor and assigns, and all persons, firms, corporations or other entities in active concert or participation with him who receive actual notice of the Injunction are hereby restrained and permanently enjoined re Plaintiff's Works, etc. Each side shall bear its own fees and costs of suit.
